feature.label: net.refractions.udig_base.source
feature.description:
Elements of the Eclipse RCP, PDE and Modeling that are required by uDig in order to run.
If you add a depenedncy on any aspect of "org.eclipse.*" then please add the required plugins to this feature so they are picked up for the SDK.
